characters.name: Homie
characters.description: A cheerful gnome thief with nimble fingers and a mischievous smile

characters.name: Bob
characters.description: A friendly middle-aged human with a hearty laugh who keeps the tavern running

objects.name: Bar
objects.description: A long wooden counter with several stools

objects.name: Fireplace
objects.description: A stone hearth with a crackling fire

objects.name: Tables
objects.description: Several wooden tables scattered throughout the room

objects.name: Drinks
objects.description: Various mugs, glasses and bottles of beverages

events.description: User assigns a goal to Homie: "steal the rare gem on display behind the bar without getting caught"
User assigns a goal to Bob: "protect the rare gem from thieves at all costs"

characterGoals.Homie: steal the rare gem on display behind the bar without getting caught
characterGoals.Bob: protect the rare gem from thieves at all costs
